titleStmt.title: Maudlin the merchant's daughter of Bristol. To the tune of, The maiden's joy, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. and are to be sold by the Booksellers of Pye-corner and London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Right half-sheet contains: The second part of sweet Maudlin, to the same tune.
Imperfect: sheet cropped at top with loss of text.
Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
